text:
Washington, DC / Full Stack JS / Full-Time (Onsite)

Social Tables is one of the hottest #DCtech startups with excellent employees, culture, and revenue numbers. We’re ~110 employees, currently in Chinatown, and moving to an awesome new 35k sq. ft office at 14th and G in two weeks.

That’s where you come in :)

Reasons you should be working at Social Tables

- Full Stack JS

- Solid combination of cutting and bleeding edge tech in production

- Hiring talented engineers across all levels

- Everyone gets stock

- Series A company so your stock is actually worth something

- Awesome growth curve

- Committed to hiring good

- Committed to helping you grow as an engineer

- https://jobs.lever.co/socialtables

I’m Hunter@socialtables.com (Dir. of Engineering) feel free to email to talk / get the inside track. Happy to talk about non dev roles too.

https://www.socialtables.com/
